about_the_game:
Survival and Combat
The zombie virus has spread throughout the world, and civilization and order have collapsed. Only bullets and blades can keep you and your companions alive;

Building communities
Build a shelter to accommodate all survivors, provide food and safety, and rebuild human civilization;

Explore and Encounter
When exploring and searching for resources, you often encounter various survivors, and what happens to them depends entirely on your choice, whether it's kind or cruel;

War and Trade
Many communities like you are searching for their own survival paths. They may become your enemies or allies, enslaving, surrendering, or becoming allies with them will determine whether your community can survive;

name: The End of Humanity/人之将死

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 960

short_description: Survival and construction at the end of zombies, rebuilding homes or becoming plunderers, witnessing the extinction and struggle of human nature
